resources.string: This app is made to help calculate optimal solutions for smelting metals in a mod for Minecraft called TerraFirmaCraft. You simply type in what resources you have available, and press a button, and all the number crunching is done automatically for you.
The app is divided into 2 parts - Crucible and Vessel mode. The Vessel mode is currently unavailable due to some difficulties, but will be coming out soon.

In this part of the app, you choose how many Ingots of an alloy you would like to make. Simply type the amount into the field. Next to the ingot input field, there is a drop-down menu that allows you to pick which alloy to make. You simply click it and choose desired alloy. Keep in mind that some alloys are only available in the crucible, hence they\'re only displayed in the crucible mode.

This part allows you to enter how much of what resource you have. Simply click on a picture of the resource and a window will come up. Inside that window you enter the amount. You can also spare yourself some counting by giving it how many stacks of ore you have instead of giving a precise amount.

This part takes in the desired ratios of the alloy. It also shows the max and min allowed ratio for each material. It\'s not possible to enter decimal numbers because in the future the app will adjust the ratios if the current ratios can\'t be satisfied.

The Amounts button turns on/off the ability to see the amount of the material you typed in. Finally the Optimize button, calculates the result and displays it in a presentable way. Keep in mind that it isn\'t always possible to get such a result. The app will try its best to tell you what\'s wrong.
This app is still in it\'s alpha mode and it contains bugs. Please repport them when they\'re encountered and they will be fixed as soon as possible.
